content.prompt: We learn from the words <u>Morem</u> . . . <u>adiciam</u> (lines 7-8) that

choices.label: Jupiter is angry that there have not been enough sacriﬁces made to the gods
Jupiter will add the custom of religious rites to the new race
Juno and some of the other gods will do their best to cause a delay to the Trojans
Juno has asked Jupiter for a special sacriﬁce to be added in her honor

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
